abstract: Coca Crystal, counterculture celebrity and host of cable access show If I Can't Dance, You Can Keep Your Revolution, dies at age 68.

headline.print_headline: Coca Crystal, Avatar of Counterculture, Dies at 68
headline.main: Coca Crystal, Avatar of Counterculture and Provocateur, Dies at 68

keywords.value: If I Can't Dance, You Can Keep Your Revolution (TV Program)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: With an anarchist past that included a well-aimed apple pie and lab rats at a luncheon, Ms. Crystal hosted the public-access channel variety show “If I Can’t Dance, You Can Keep Your Revolution.”
lead_paragraph: With an anarchist past that included a well-aimed apple pie and lab rats at a luncheon, Ms. Crystal hosted the public-access channel variety show “If I Can’t Dance, You Can Keep Your Revolution.”
